title: Deilie Jock
author: Campbell, C. M.
snippet: I need hardly say, sir, that they had gotten aneeghbourin' polisman to sweer that he had seenDugald and anither man on the Glasgow Roadthe evenin' before the affair; and a third yin thatswoor he saw Dugald crossing Ratho Brig, wi' hisface a' bashed, the mornin' after. He said thathe had spoken to him and recognized his voiceperfectly.
